title: Founded on science
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, British Information Services, James Carr and James Allen
brief_description: Illustrates the role scientific research and development plays in civil engineering. Discusses varying methods of stabilising foundations, including repairing of existing foundations. Also details quality control testing of materials and/or methods.
